# Dhanush Portfolio Project

## Project Type
Modern React portfolio website with Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion

## Tech Stack
- React 18
- Vite (build tool)
- Tailwind CSS (styling)
- Framer Motion (animations)

## Design Principles
- Clean modern UI with soft white base
- Pastel blue and subtle purple accents
- Theme: "Smart. Confident. Creative."
- Glassmorphism effects
- Smooth scroll animations
- Glowing accent hover effects

## Site Structure
Single-page application with sections:
1. Hero Section
2. About Section
3. Experience & Leadership
4. Projects
5. Achievements & Certifications
6. Education
7. Contact
